text: West London Synagogue is the oldest Reform synagogue located in London, England, United Kingdom. The synagogue was established on 15 April 1840. == Building == The current building, built in 1870, is located near Marble Arch in London. The main sanctuary is built in the Byzantine architectural style. The premises also contain offices, a library and community facilities. == Other websites == *The West London Synagogue *The Movement for Reform Judaism Category:Synagogues Category:Buildings and structures in the City of Westminster
title: West London Synagogue
